external_references.description: Jeff Johnson, Fred Plan, Adrian Sanchez, Renato Fontana, Jake Nicastro, Dimiter Andonov, Marius Fodoreanu, Daniel Scott. (2023, April 20). 3CX Software Supply Chain Compromise Initiated by a Prior Software Supply Chain Compromise; Suspected North Korean Actor Responsible. Retrieved August 25, 2025.
Robert Falcone, Josh Grunzweig. (2023, March 30). Threat Brief: 3CXDesktopApp Supply Chain Attack. Retrieved September 15, 2025.

objects.description: During the [3CX Supply Chain Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0057), [AppleJeus](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1049)'s COLDCAT C2 leverages cookie headers to contain data over HTTPS. Cookies also contain hardcoded variables `__tutma` or `__tutmc` in the payload's HTTPS request.(Citation: Mandiant 3cx UNC4736 2023)(Citation: Unit42 3cx supply chain 2023)
